data.name: Absolver Thrull
data.oracle_text:
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Absolver Thrull enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target enchantment.

data.name: Auratouched Mage
data.oracle_text: When Auratouched Mage enters the battlefield, search your library for an Aura card that could enchant it. If Auratouched Mage is still on the battlefield, put that Aura card onto the battlefield attached to it. Otherwise, reveal the Aura card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

data.name: Aurora Eidolon
data.oracle_text:
{W}, Sacrifice Aurora Eidolon: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Aurora Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Azorius Herald
data.oracle_text:
Azorius Herald can't be blocked.
When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
When Azorius Herald enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {U} was spent to cast it.
data.flavor_text:
"As peace should be—gentle yet unstoppable."
—Augustin IV

data.name: Bathe in Light
data.oracle_text: Radiance — Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Truth shines even in darkness. Those who march on the side of truth walk always in righteous light."

data.name: Beacon Hawk
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Beacon Hawk deals combat damage to a player, you may untap target creature.
{W}: Beacon Hawk gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

data.name: Belfry Spirit
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Belfry Spirit enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying.

data.name: Benediction of Moons
data.oracle_text:
You gain 1 life for each player.
Haunt (When this spell card is put into a graveyard after resolving, exile it haunting target creature.)
When the creature Benediction of Moons haunts dies, you gain 1 life for each player.

data.name: Benevolent Ancestor
data.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
data.flavor_text: Although the door is flimsy and the lock pathetically small, Josuri's family never fears the night outside.

data.name: Blazing Archon
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Creatures can't attack you.
data.flavor_text:
"Through the haze of battle I saw the glint of sun on golden mane, the sheen of glory clad in mail, and I dropped my sword and wept at the idiocy of war."
—Dravin, Gruul deserter

data.name: Blessing of the Nephilim
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.
data.flavor_text: "Before the first stone was laid or the first elf-child born, the power of the nephilim was gathering. Let that power be spread by my hands."

data.name: Boros Fury-Shield
data.oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking or blocking creature this turn. If {R} was spent to cast Boros Fury-Shield, it deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

data.name: Brace for Impact
data.oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target multicolored creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
data.flavor_text: Flesh can be tempered by spellcraft and forged ever stronger by the hammers of foes.

data.name: Caregiver
data.oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
data.flavor_text: "The guilds each believe its way is right, but their ways only bring blood to Ravnica's streets and tears to Ravnica's families."

data.name: Carom
data.oracle_text:
The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Her enemy's strength is her own.

data.name: Celestial Ancient
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
data.flavor_text:
"We thought the clouds had moved from the night sky. Then the night sky moved, and the horizon grew wings."
—Josuri

data.name: Chant of Vitu-Ghazi
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

data.name: Concerted Effort
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if a creature you control has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, landwalk, protection, trample, and vigilance.

data.name: Conclave Equenaut
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
data.flavor_text: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.

data.name: Conclave Phalanx
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Conclave Phalanx enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

data.name: Conclave's Blessing
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 for each other creature you control.

data.name: Condemn
data.oracle_text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
data.flavor_text:
"No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now!"
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

data.name: Courier Hawk
data.oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
data.flavor_text: The Orzhov started using hawks as messengers in order to bypass the many toll roads and bridges that dot Ravnica. Soon the service became one of their most profitable businesses.

data.name: Devouring Light
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Exile target attacking or blocking creature.
data.flavor_text: Into the light the good are welcomed, and with the light the evil are banished.

data.name: Divebomber Griffin
data.oracle_text:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice Divebomber Griffin: Divebomber Griffin deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
data.flavor_text: Justice flies swiftly on angry wings.

data.name: Dromad Purebred
data.oracle_text: Whenever Dromad Purebred is dealt damage, you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text:
"I have seen much from the back of my dromad, most of it terribly wrong. The more I see, the more I am convinced of the rightness of my path."
—Heruj, Selesnya initiate

data.name: Droning Bureaucrats
data.oracle_text: {X}, {T}: Each creature with converted mana cost X can't attack or block this turn.
data.flavor_text: " . . . and you must also apply for an application license, file documents 136(iv) and 22-C and -D in triplicate, pay all requisite fees, request a . . ."

data.name: Faith's Fetters
data.oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When Faith's Fetters enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
Enchanted permanent's activated abilities can't be activated unless they're mana abilities. If enchanted permanent is a creature, it can't attack or block.

data.name: Festival of the Guildpact
data.oracle_text:
Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Everyone knows that violence at the Festival brings the worst of luck, so for at least one day a year arms are laid down in favor of brimming goblets.

data.name: Flickerform
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{2}{W}{W}: Exile enchanted creature and all Auras attached to it. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, return the other cards exiled this way to the battlefield under their owners' control attached to that creature.

data.name: Freewind Equenaut
data.oracle_text:
Flying
As long as Freewind Equenaut is enchanted, it has "{T}: Freewind Equenaut deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature."
data.flavor_text: Confront her, and feel the hooves of her steed. Ignore her, and feel the sting of her arrow.

data.name: Gate Hound
data.oracle_text: Creatures you control have vigilance as long as Gate Hound is enchanted.
data.flavor_text:
"Ditri, I leave this checkpoint in your capable teeth."
—Kitov, nightguard patrol

data.name: Ghosts of the Innocent
data.oracle_text: If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals half that damage, rounded down, to that creature or player instead.
data.flavor_text:
"Ma said we should offer up blini-cakes and salt to the good ones, but I get that chill up my spine and just shut the door."
—Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

data.name: Ghost Warden
data.oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"I thought of fate as an iron lattice, intricate but rigidly unchangeable. That was until some force bent fate's bars to spare my life."
—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

data.name: Ghostway
data.oracle_text: Exile each creature you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
data.flavor_text:
"I watched its blade swing through me, but I was hollow, empty. I saw its face contort in rage but could not hear it snarl."
—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

data.name: Graven Dominator
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)
When Graven Dominator enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, each other creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.

data.name: Guardian of the Guildpact
data.oracle_text: Protection from monocolored
data.flavor_text: The magic of the Guildpact gives aegis to the spirits pressed into its service. Upon entering the afterlife, they find new focus and are charged with defending the Guildpact against those who would see it broken.

data.name: Guardian's Magemark
data.oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1.
data.flavor_text: The soldier moved with fluid poise, his awareness extending far beyond five senses.

data.name: Haazda Exonerator
data.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Haazda Exonerator: Destroy target Aura.
data.flavor_text: "This aura threatens the sanctity of your soul. Wrenching it free won't be easy on either of us. If you're ready, we'll begin."

data.name: Haazda Shield Mate
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Haazda Shield Mate unless you pay {W}{W}.
{W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
data.flavor_text: The Haazda shield is broad, protecting both the free and the guilded.

data.name: Harrier Griffin
data.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, tap target creature.
data.flavor_text: Moon Market merchants sell a bottled scent to cutpurses and other criminals. Those doused in the liquid become "griffin bait."

data.name: Hour of Reckoning
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy all nontoken creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"Ravnica, like a hedge, must be pruned, leaving only leaves of verdant uniformity."
—Niszka, Selesnya evangel

data.name: Hunted Lammasu
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Hunted Lammasu enters the battlefield, target opponent creates a 4/4 black Horror creature token.
data.flavor_text: The lammasu ruled the velds before the city grew. Now they roam Ravnica's skies, but their ancient enemies have not forgotten them.

data.name: Leave No Trace
data.oracle_text: Radiance — Destroy target enchantment and each other enchantment that shares a color with it.
data.flavor_text: The magic of the Boros patrols the streets even when their soldiers do not.

data.name: Leyline of the Meek
data.oracle_text:
If Leyline of the Meek is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Creature tokens get +1/+1.
data.flavor_text: Where strength and humility converge.

data.name: Light of Sanction
data.oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control by sources you control.
data.flavor_text: The Legion looks after its own.

data.name: Lionheart Maverick
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
{4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

data.name: Loxodon Gatekeeper
data.oracle_text: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
data.flavor_text: The gatekeepers are so fastidious that even the winds must wait to pass.

data.name: Martyred Rusalka
data.oracle_text: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature can't attack this turn.
data.flavor_text: Rakdos cultists hanged her for sport in the township square. Her ghost now stands vigil at what has become known as the Tree of Weeping.

data.name: Mistral Charger
data.oracle_text: Flying
data.flavor_text: Some sky steeds break from the thundering herd to ride free on the open winds.

data.name: Nightguard Patrol
data.oracle_text: First strike, vigilance
data.flavor_text: "The Wojek defend the laws. We defend the people."

data.name: Oathsworn Giant
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Other creatures you control get +0/+2 and have vigilance.
data.flavor_text: The town stands on his ancestors' former burial grounds. Even with the graves long gone, he continues his determined vigil.

data.name: Order of the Stars
data.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
As Order of the Stars enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Order of the Stars has protection from the chosen color.
data.flavor_text: As stoic as the marble halls, as unblinking as the stars upon their shields.

data.name: Paladin of Prahv
data.oracle_text:
Whenever Paladin of Prahv deals damage, you gain that much life.
Forecast — {1}{W}, Reveal Paladin of Prahv from your hand: Whenever target creature deals damage this turn, you gain that much life. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

data.name: Proclamation of Rebirth
data.oracle_text:
Return up to three target creature cards with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Forecast — {5}{W}, Reveal Proclamation of Rebirth from your hand: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

data.name: Proper Burial
data.oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
data.flavor_text: Properly honored dead gain the peace of the grave and freedom from the call of the Ghost Quarter.

data.name: Sandsower
data.oracle_text: Tap three untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.
data.flavor_text: It drifts through the streets as a breeze of collective sighs, wilting the bustle with dreams and heavy eyelids.

data.name: Screeching Griffin
data.oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: Target creature can't block Screeching Griffin this turn.
data.flavor_text: They were master fishers, but their seas are now the streets and their catch, the goblins that run pell-mell from the screeching in the sky.

data.name: Seed Spark
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If {G} was spent to cast Seed Spark, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
data.flavor_text:
"If you ask me, those root-lovers value mindless dogma over progress."
—Trivaz, Izzet mage

data.name: Shadow Lance
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has first strike.
{1}{B}: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Shadow lances are crafted from harvested souls. The more wicked the sinner, the keener the blade.

data.name: Shrieking Grotesque
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Shrieking Grotesque enters the battlefield, if {B} was spent to cast it, target player discards a card.
data.flavor_text: Orzhov mage-sculptors bring their stone to life before they carve it. The shrieking begins as soon as the mouths are formed.

data.name: Sinstriker's Will
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target attacking or blocking creature."
data.flavor_text: "Steel rusts. Arrows break. But righteousness is always strong, always sharp."

data.name: Skyrider Trainee
data.oracle_text: Skyrider Trainee has flying as long as it's enchanted.
data.flavor_text: "Of course I plan on going up. Kang here is the most trusted 'fin on the squad. Afraid? Me? No, I'm just . . . waiting for the right wind conditions."

data.name: Soulsworn Jury
data.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{1}{U}, Sacrifice Soulsworn Jury: Counter target creature spell.
data.flavor_text: In death, as in life, they protect the Grand Arbiter from exposure to contrary points of view.

data.name: Spelltithe Enforcer
data.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays {1}.
data.flavor_text: His assistants calculate the amount of the tribute. He measures out the punishment for delinquency.

data.name: Steeling Stance
data.oracle_text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Forecast — {W}, Reveal Steeling Stance from your hand: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

data.name: Stoic Ephemera
data.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
When Stoic Ephemera blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
data.flavor_text: "Life is fleeting, and so is death. Only the oath is eternal."

data.name: Storm Herd
data.oracle_text: Create X 1/1 white Pegasus creature tokens with flying, where X is your life total.
data.flavor_text:
"When you hear thunder on a cloudless day, take cover and brace for the coming of the storm herd."
—Skotov, Tin Street basket vendor

data.name: Suppression Field
data.oracle_text: Activated abilities cost {2} more to activate unless they're mana abilities.
data.flavor_text: The most feared of Azorius punishments is to be freed—sent back out into the world, stripped of all magical defenses.

data.name: Three Dreams
data.oracle_text: Search your library for up to three Aura cards with different names, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
data.flavor_text:
"Choose one to heal, one to harm, and one to grant you the prudence to use them."
—Miotri, auratouched mage

data.name: To Arms!
data.oracle_text:
Untap all creatures you control.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"The call came, spell-borne through mortar and stone to the ear of every soldier. The call came, and the advantage was ours."
—Lodusz, captain of the watch

data.name: Twilight Drover
data.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Twilight Drover.
{2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Twilight Drover: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

data.name: Valor Made Real
data.oracle_text: Target creature can block any number of creatures this turn.
data.flavor_text: "As my father taught, 'Training will raise your shield to the blow, but courage fills the gaps the shield leaves open.'"

data.name: Veteran Armorer
data.oracle_text: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.
data.flavor_text: "Give me a sword and I'll kill a few enemies. But give me a hammer and a fiery forge, and I'll turn the tide of battle."

data.name: Votary of the Conclave
data.oracle_text: {2}{G}: Regenerate Votary of the Conclave.
data.flavor_text: An ageless order, the votaries receive the gift of rejuvenation from the temple gardens they guard.

data.name: Wakestone Gargoyle
data.oracle_text:
Defender, flying
{1}{W}: Creatures you control with defender can attack this turn as though they didn't have defender.
data.flavor_text: Its pulsating cry shatters bonds of iron, granite, and servitude.

data.name: Withstand
data.oracle_text:
Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Defense is as much a part of war as offense, the shield as important a tool as the sword."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

data.name: Wojek Apothecary
data.oracle_text: Radiance — {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it this turn.
data.flavor_text: "A few arrows aren't enough to pierce your faith, soldier. You'll be back on the battlefield by sun's dawn."

data.name: Wojek Siren
data.oracle_text: Radiance — Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: It is the call to arms, the call to fury, the call to blood.
